line.originaltext: 6 pounds tart apples, cored and sliced
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "6 pounds tart apples, cored and sliced")

line.originaltext: Place the apples in a Dutch oven.
Place the apples in a Dutch oven.

line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1}, ing5, "apples and cider", "pour in cider")

line.originaltext: Bring to a boil and cook on medium heat 30 minutes, or until soft.
line.annotation: cook(ing5, t0, ing6, "hot apples mixture", "bring to a boil and cook on medium heat 30 minutes, or until soft")

line.originaltext: Press the softened mixture through a food mill.
Press the softened mixture through a food mill.
line.annotation: mix(ing6, t1, ing7, "pressed apple mixture", "press mixture through food mill")

line.originaltext: Continue cooking at a medium boil for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
line.annotation: cook(ing7, t0, ing8, "hot pressed apple mixture", "cook at medium boil for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally")

line.originaltext: Mix in the sugar, cinnamon and cloves.
line.annotation: combine({ing2, ing3, ing4, ing8}, ing9, "apple sugar and spices mix", "mix")

line.originaltext: Continue cooking over low heat until the sugar dissolves, stirring frequently.
line.annotation: cook(ing9, t0, ing10, "dissolved sugar mix", "cook over low eat until sugar disolves, stirring frequently")

line.originaltext: Cook until the desired thickness has been attained.
line.annotation: cook(ing10, t0, ing11, "hot apple butter", "cook until desired thickness has been attained")

line.originaltext: Cook until the desired thickness has been attained.
Refrigerate the finished apple butter in sterile containers.
